text: Gustaf Peter Lundblad (26 August 1950 â€“ 22 December 2015) was a Swedish singer and songwriter. He was known for his 1986 song "Ta mig till havet". Lundblad started his career in the band 'The most Remarkable Nailband'. Lundblad died of prostate cancer on 22 December 2015 in Stockholm at the age of 65. ==References== ==Other websites== *Aftonbladet.se *Official website Category:1950 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Swedish singer-songwriters
title: Peter Lundblad
